params._bytecode: The executable bytecode of the TOFT contract.

executeCalls((address,uint256,bytes,bool.details: Used to call derived OFT functions to a TOFT contract.

returns.results: The message of the execution, could be an error message.

executeTOFT(address,bytes,bool).details: Used to call derived OFT functions to a TOFT contract.

params._bytecode: The executable bytecode of the TOFT contract.
params._toft: The TOFT contract to execute against.

returns.result: The error message if the execution failed.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

createTOFT(address,bytes,bytes32,bool).notice: Deploy a new TOFT contract. Callable only by the owner.

executeCalls((address,uint256,bytes,bool.notice: Execute the `_bytecode` against the `_toft`. Callable only by the owner.

executeTOFT(address,bytes,bool).notice: Execute the `_bytecode` against the `_toft`. Callable only by the owner.

harvestableTapiocaOFTsLength().notice: Return the number of harvestable TOFT contracts deployed on the current chain.

lastTOFT().notice: Return the latest TOFT contract deployed on the current chain.

tapiocaOFTLength().notice: Return the number of TOFT contracts deployed on the current chain.

tapiocaOFTsByErc20(address).notice: Map of deployed TOFT contracts by ERC20.

documentation.text: @notice Map of deployed TOFT contracts by ERC20.
@notice Called when a new OFT is deployed.
@notice If the TOFT is already deployed.
@notice Failed to deploy the TapiocaWrapper contract.
@notice The management fee is too high. Currently set to a max of 50 BPS or 0.5%.
@notice No TOFT has been deployed yet.
@notice Return the number of TOFT contracts deployed on the current chain.
@notice Return the number of harvestable TOFT contracts deployed on the current chain.
@notice Return the latest TOFT contract deployed on the current chain.
